items.content1: All bookings are subject to seat availability and confirmation by the bus operator. Please provide accurate information during booking. Incorrect details may result in booking failure or boarding issues.
items.content2: Full payment is required at the time of booking. Accepted payment methods are listed on the website. Bookings are confirmed only after successful payment.
items.content3: After payment, tickets will be sent to your email or available for download. Keep your ticket code safe and present it when boarding.
items.content4: Cancellation and refund policies depend on each bus operator. Please review the specific terms during booking. We are not responsible for operator-initiated changes or cancellations.
items.content5: Changes to bookings (date, time, passenger info) are subject to operator policies. Contact customer support or the operator for assistance.
items.content6: Arrive at the departure point at least 30 minutes before departure. Present a valid ticket (printed or electronic) and identification if required.
items.content7: If your ticket is lost or stolen, contact customer support promptly. Ticket re-issuance is subject to verification and operator policy.
items.content8: Bus operators are responsible for providing transportation as described in your booking. We are not liable for delays, cancellations, or service changes by operators.
items.content9: Passengers must behave respectfully and follow bus staff instructions. Disruptive or unlawful behavior may result in denial of service without refund.
items.content10: We may update these ticket policies at any time. Changes are effective upon posting on the website.

items.content1: The refund policy applies to cases where customers cancel tickets in accordance with the regulations of each bus operator. Please carefully check the refund terms when booking tickets.
items.content2: We collect and use your personal data to process refunds and support customers. Data is kept confidential and used only for purposes related to refund transactions.
items.content3: We use cookies to improve user experience and support the refund process. Cookies help remember transaction information and assist with verification when needed.
items.content4: Personal data related to refunds will be stored for as long as necessary to process the transaction and comply with legal regulations.

items.content1: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using the website.
items.content2: We collect two main types of information on the website: personal information (name, email, phone number, address, etc.) and non-personal information (browser type, device, operating system, IP address, browsing activity, etc.).
items.content3: The information collected helps us operate the website efficiently, send notifications, respond to your requests, analyze and improve services, personalize your experience, and comply with legal regulations.
items.content4: We may share information with partners who provide services to support website operations. These partners are responsible for confidentiality and only use the information for the specified purposes. We do not share personal information for marketing purposes without your consent.
items.content5: We only retain personal information for as long as necessary to serve the purpose of collection or as required by law.
items.content6: We apply reasonable security measures to protect information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no system can guarantee absolute safety on the Internet.
items.content7: We may update this privacy policy at any time. All changes will be announced on the website. Please check regularly for the latest updates.
items.content8: This is a sample policy and may need adjustments to comply with legal regulations and the actual operation of the website. Please consult a legal expert if necessary.
